name: absorb
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
